entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 5 April 2023
